snippet: Colombia refused on Thursday to entertain asylum applications from six Cubans who have been stuck in the transit area of Bogota's international airport since New Year's Day after a failed attempt to enter Ecuador....

headline.print_headline: 6 Cuban Asylum-Seekers Stuck at Bogota Airport
headline.main: 6 Cuban Asylum-Seekers Stuck at Bogota Airport

lead_paragraph: Colombia refused on Thursday to entertain asylum applications from six Cubans who have been stuck in the transit area of Bogota's international airport since New Year's Day after a failed attempt to enter Ecuador.
